name: Battle Ballz
description:
Gameplay:

*Drag and pull the screen to the desired direction and release to shoot.
*Avoid the laser
*TRY TO SCORE AT LEASE 10. >:)

Features:
Multiple Battle Ballz to choose from and more battle ballz in future.
Easy to play hard to master type of game.
ENDLESS BATTLE
Great Game for passing the time.
Challenging Gameplay

COLLAPSE
